website_summaries.verdict: A striking seven-piece set with a gorgeous acacia wood dining surface and enough room to comfortably seat six diners.
pros: Spacious dining table with pretty wood top
Set includes six poly rattan chairs with generous armrests and waterproof cushions
Chairs have a high weight capacity (over 350 pounds) and can be stacked
cons: Chairs must be assembled, and some buyers complain it’s an arduous task

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It looks elegant and is comfy. The size is average and appropriate. It’s a really good product for the price. Customer service is very helpful in case you need help with anything
customer_reviews.author: anahita k

customer_reviews.title: Check before yo make sure everything is intact
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the fact that I receive 1 box with parts of the furniture broken but I call and they send me another box and I’m happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. Table assembly easy and straight forward. Chair assembly a little more difficult, but still not too bad. Table is good quality. Chair pads are very thin. Also this order came in there speedster boxes, different days which was confusing. Overall a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SET FOR PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a month, but we use it daily here at our cabin. So far so good. It wasn’t as hard to put together as we thought it would be (looking at other reviews) and took about 4 hours. My daughter put this together by herself! I most definitely recommend, and the ONLY reason it’s getting 4 stars is we’ve only had it a month. I’ll update later as to long-term durability, but I think it’s going to last a good while. Oh, chairs aren’t fairly comfy. I’ve had better, but I’ve had worse.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was not that bad...
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy. The chairs required a bit of push/shove on occasion but my biggest recommendation is to have a ratcheting screwdriver with a hex head - if you use the hex wrenches that come with the order, it will take significantly longer to assemble. As with any project, having the right tools makes the job easier. That said, the set looks awesome on my patio. I plan to water-seal the wood areas to protect them. Otherwise, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Darwin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: While this takes a while to assemble and some of the screws are very tight, once assembled it is an amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: neal

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. The chairs are comfortable to sit on. The table and the chairs are easy to assemble. The product is overall very good, but I have one complaint. Maybe this is just me, but the white cushions in the pictures are a bit misleading, they look very white in the pictures, but when I got them, they weren't white at all.
customer_reviews.author: hamza ojjeh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set Will need to treat the wood. The Assembly is time consuming when it comes to the chairs. I’d recommend 2 people for this. I did assemble myself just had to split up my days for the chairs . It arrived in a timely manner.. no damage. Great addition to my back yard. Over all totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Porter

customer_reviews.title: Best deal possible
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for a 6 seater patio set with comfortable chairs with a wood table and this was by far the cheapest. The quality is good, though one arm was a bit off and we informed the seller, so they gave us $60 to fix it. Not replacing it, but it's fine since it was so affordable. These are comfortable, truly waterproof, and don't scratch our deck when we slide them around. The table comes together and looks a little cheap on the sides where the wicker meets, but really, the price is such a steal, it's 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Appearance 5 quality -0-
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item several months ago. Finally had the opportunity to assembly or better put rebuild. Parts had to modified at every point in the process holes wouldn't align some where so far off i just drilled and tapped new threads. i had duplicate parts included and essential parts left out.Challenging to say the least. When people comment on it i just tell them truthfully i built it. Appearance is great but getting to the end was horrific
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set the workmanship is bad. A lot of the wicker were cut short and sticking out on three out of six chairs and table has three missing wicker strips and one not tracked down in frame. If it didn’t take so long to put together I would have returned and asked for replacement. The company gave me a small credit so at least the company worked with me somewhat
customer_reviews.author: rachele holden

customer_reviews.title: Installation was easy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to purchase after reading some of the reviews, but this was very easy to install. Looks great in our outside kitchen. And very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TeenDee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material and metal
customer_reviews.text: The picture was so amazing that I can’t resist myself to buy it. Wicker came out from the furniture. The set is not easy to assemble, its time consuming process. The material is not sturdy. The metal was rustic and color came out. I won’t give a single star to this patio set. Don’t buy it. I have already initiated return while writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Kajal makwana

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together was a nightmare!! The screw holes did not match up. The webbing was broken in two spots and not wrapped all the way to the end. We tried to contact customer service. We left a written message on the website over a week a go with no return answer. We did our best and after 10 hours of pushing and sometimes swearing we got it together. Sending it back would have been a bigger nightmare. I think customer service owes us an apology for their poor service. I think I don’t like it as much because of the stress it took and the poor quality of some of the webbing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table set
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to align all the screws for the chairs and had some trouble inserting some of the table legs and sides together. I had to use some pliers to bend or open certain parts to make them slide into each other. After putting it together, the table set looks really nice. Only other issue is that the wooden armrests look a bit worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Favi-T

customer_reviews.title: Assembling was difficult
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy putting things together. I had a hard time with assembling this outfit. The holes did not always line up and had to have my husband pull on the chair and table parts to get them lined up so I could screw everything together. Looks great after assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Box 2 of 3 is for a different patio set. 😔
customer_reviews.text: Box 2 of 3 is the wrong box! 😱 I've been waiting on the set and I was SO happy when I seen it in the camera...wating on a reply to my email that I sent yesterday. I will update later.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee-

customer_reviews.title: Love this outdoor dining set!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this set. I’m not going to lie the chairs were a pain to assemble, but the quality is there! The pieces even smelled good... can’t explain other than it doesn’t have a cheap plastic smell! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Valletta

customer_reviews.title: Nice Workable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. My only issues is that when putting it together the beams didn’t slide in easily. I actually had to bend the open so the beam would fit in them hammer it down. And also on the chairs they was no “studs” on the two back legs. So don’t know if that was on purpose but I don’t like that because the chairs are uneven and rocks backwards. But overall the look and quality of the wood is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but one of the panels for the table is warped...curving upward. Set also arrived in three different shipments, all on different days and later than expected.
customer_reviews.author: jame.rame

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, however appeared larger to me in pics. Not complaining though!! Not for’ large’ guests however.... be certain to have a drill for use as there’s lots of screws to place!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanenne

customer_reviews.title: Horrible assembly process, but nice set in the end.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a bear. Every piece had holes that weren't properly aligned and several holes were covered by the ratan wicker. Each chair took over an hour to assemble because of these issues. It took 2 full days to assemble the whole set. Once together, the set looks nice and is sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TraciNicks

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is attractive and durable. Assembly was easy (did it without assistance). Balancing screws work well to level on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: PVR

customer_reviews.title: Wood is not sealed
customer_reviews.text: We have had to reseal the wood twice since purchase 6 months ago. They never treated the wood or used a subpar product. The cushions hold water.
customer_reviews.author: K and C

customer_reviews.title: Check product really well before putting together.
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces of the wicker were coming off from the chairs... had to glue them back. Other than that, it's a great patio asset. Very confy as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this rod to create moving targets for my pistol range. Steel is mild for welding and strong and straight.
customer_reviews.author: Rod HTA

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews that talked about how hard the chairs were to put together. Not true at all! I took me about one hour to put together three chairs by myself. They are very sturdy and very comfortable! I am very pleased with the product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to our new screened porch
customer_reviews.text: After an initial issue with a warped table top piece which was remedied quickly, we are very pleased with the look and function of this table and chair set. We have had many positive comments.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: A great table set but slight pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to assemble as the screws broke off or wouldn't screw in on some holes but other than that great table set.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kalkofen

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio set for 6
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was acceptable, not so easy, but acceptable. The acacia top is great, water resistant, The cushions are cover removeable, hence washable. Seats are sturdy. Good furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk
customer_reviews.text: It is pure garbage. Falling apart before I ever used it. A total waste of money. Don’t be fooled this is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: John brough

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have contacted seller twice with no contact at all. The chairs are super tiny and uncomfortable to say the least, one chair had a crack in it and one chair came without all pieces. So we have 5 chairs, 4 in okay condition and wood is cheap, really cheap! Do not buy! I want to sit it out in front of my house with a FREE sign!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not what it looks like
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than it looks. Also it is not made very well. I started to put it together and saw that there were parts of the metal that were not covered by the weave wrap. I decided then that I would send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful set unfortunately I didn’t have anyone available to put it together for me so I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are a little difficult to put together. But overall a beautiful patio set.
customer_reviews.author: Cgrims

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: The table is beautiful however was disappointed to see that the cushions were not cream as shown in the picture. They are brownish taupe , nothing close to the picture! Also, was not easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: judy grzyb

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good 7-piece set of outdoor rattan tables and chairs, I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are not the easiest to assemble, but the table was. It's very pretty and I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: CaboDave99

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: We also had a glass top made for the table to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: Chairs won't accommodate big bodies
customer_reviews.text: looks nice but hard to assemble. The chairs are not very wide so if youre looking for a set that fits non-stick people, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: taylor sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The wooden part is untreated and is beginning to mold even after I oiled it. I’m not crazy about the cushions; too thin but my cushions from my old set fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had this table for about a month and a half and am incredibly disappointed. The table top is already coming apart as shown in the photos. I regret this purchase and wish I had gone with something different.
customer_reviews.author: Quarters?  Really?

customer_reviews.title: Love the design.
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the backyard, not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dining set!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to assemble and had to return a few pieces for new parts because the holes weren’t lining up. But in the end, looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Garza

customer_reviews.title: love my new deck table and chairs
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs make my deck a whole new living space!
customer_reviews.author: karey sparks

customer_reviews.title: No umbrella hole
customer_reviews.text: Like the size Dislike the wood top does not have a uniform fit Dislike no umbrella hole Assembly not real easy
customer_reviews.author: Frederick J Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful when finished
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and color. Put it in mybyard
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Robins

customer_reviews.title: just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: good value for money, took me around 1hr to put together, was very easy
customer_reviews.author: Len Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Low quality manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible experience to assemble. The metal parts often do not match and I had to enlarge some parts with tools to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Arsen

customer_reviews.title: We love this table
customer_reviews.text: We recently created a new patio and this table fit perfectly. Very sturdy and looks wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: James S. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Great set for an out door patio
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly on our patio, chairs are comfy and the table is weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: Terese Harris

customer_reviews.title: Items arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Unlike all my prior excellent experience with Amazon returns., seller expects me to pay several hundred dollars to return item. This does not fit with Amazon's image nor my prior experience with Amazon which has always been positive. I would recommend dropping this seller from Amazon. I still await outcome of this dispute. Additionally, I am in my 70' s, the items are heavy and not easy to return. Even the cardboard boxes were thin, flimsy and falling apart. The rattan was unraveling from two chair.s I din't even bother with opening the rest. I certainly can't recommend this product. This was a most time consuming, difficult and disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but cheapy
customer_reviews.text: This product looks really nice. It’s unfortunately very cheap. The wicker is poor quality and will probably come off (some spots came damaged already). Assembly wasn’t that hard, not sure why everyone is struggling. Use a dewalt drill and it’ll save you hours. I’m concerned about the longevity of this product. For the price I was expecting a better build. We’ll see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: mattyboy459

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Update to original post: table was outside for 3 months and it's extremely warped and finish is coming off. Extremely difficult to put together, took two and a half days. If we didn't have a garage full of tools we never would have gotten the chairs assembled. Entire set is much smaller than a normal patio set, cushions are thin and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Patio Dining Set
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service is GREAT! We had a couple of problems with loose wicker and the company took good care of us. The overall function of table and chairs is nice. It takes two people to assemble; the holes don't line up well with the pieces and several screws were stripped but we made it work. The wood on the chair arms should be rounded, leaning on the arm for any length of time isn't comfortable. The wood slats on the table should be sanded to help with cleaning and not worrying about little fingers getting splinters. It's been too hot and windy to use the set yet but we hope to real soon!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

product_meta.title: Tangkula 7 PCS Outdoor Patio Dining Set, Garden Dining Set w/Acacia Wood Table Top, Stackable Chairs with Soft Cushion, Poly Wicker Dining Table and Chairs Set (Brown)
feature_bullets: 7 Piece Modern Patio Dining Set: The modern and chic outdoor dining set includes a table and 6 chairs, which is perfect for dining party with your family and friends. More, combine exquisite rattan and delicate acacia wood, the patio dining set is fashionable and eye-catching that adding charm to your garden.

Large Dining Table W/ Acacia Top: The outdoor dining set comes with a large dinging table, which provides enough space for dining. Besides, unlike other traditional tempered glass table top, this dinging table is equipped with acacia wood top, which is more safer. Other than that, supporting by four solid feet, this dinging table is stable and heavy-duty.

Comfortable Stackable Chairs: 6 poly rattan stackable chairs feature high backrest and wide seating which design for a comfortable experience. And, wide armrest with smooth acacia top, the chair offer the best support for you. Besides, made of poly rattan and premium steel, the chairs are durable and sturdy and provide large weight capacity up to 355lbs.

Water-proof Cozy Cushions: In order to enhance comfy, this patio dining set comes with 6 soft cushions which are made of premium sponge and water-proof polyester cover. Benefit from quality materials, the cushions are not easy to collapse and suitable for outdoor use. More, with smooth zippers, the cover of cushion is removable and washable.

Dimension of Wicker Dining Set: table - 59.5" x 36" x 29" (L x W x H), chair - 24" x 23" x 35" (L x W x H), height from floor to seat (include cushion): 17”, height from floor to armrest: 26.5”, thickness of cushion: 2.5”, table weight capacity: 180 lbs, chair weight capacity: 355 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars154 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
